centers.name: Fuzhou Xingkang Hemodialysis Center
centers.address: No. 3 Xifeng Road, Fengcheng Town, Lianjiang County, Fuzhou, Fujian Province
centers.description: Fuzhou Xingkang Hemodialysis Center is equipped with a high-quality central oxygen supply system, advanced dialysis machines, and a dual-stage reverse osmosis water treatment system to ensure ultra-high purity dialysis water.
centers.tourismIntro: Fuzhou, the capital of Fujian Province, has a history of over 2,200 years and is a historical and cultural city where mountains and waters blend.

tourism.name: Three Lanes and Seven Alleys
tourism.description: A well-preserved Ming and Qing dynasty architectural complex

tourism.name: Drum Mountain
tourism.description: The highest peak in Fuzhou, home to Yongquan Temple

centers.name: Liaoning Xingkang Hemodialysis Center
centers.address: No. 61 Beishuncheng Road, Shenhe District, Shenyang
centers.description: Liaoning Xingkang Hemodialysis Center provides professional dialysis care services for patients in the Liaoning region.
centers.tourismIntro: Shenyang, the capital of Liaoning Province, is the political, economic, and cultural center of Northeast China.

tourism.name: Shenyang Imperial Palace
tourism.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site, the imperial palace of Emperor Nurhaci
